body.name: Wireless Retro Gaming Console, 9 Classic Emulators, Plug and Play Video Game Stick Built-in 10000+ Classic Games, 4K HD HDMI Output for TV with Dual 2.4G Wireless Controllers (64G)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 34 mins
features: Built-in Rich Retro Games - This wireless TV game console has built-in more than 10000 rich games, pre-installed 9 emulators Compatible with games in MAME, PS1, GB, GBA, GBC, MD, SFC, FC and ATARI formats, and comes with 64GB TF card. No need to download and install by yourself, no need to connect to the Internet, you can play 10,000+ classic games by connecting to the TV.

Double Playing Happiness for Two - This wireless retro handheld game console with built-in games is equipped with 2 PCS 2.4GHz wireless game controllers, supports 2 players to play together, wireless connection between game controllers and sticks, no road restrictions, Have more fun.

4K High Quality Visual Feast - This wireless game console is suitable for 4K Ultra HD TV/Computer/Monitor/Projector, supports HDMI connection (not AV output) using a mini HDMI cable connected to the TV, with 1080P HD quality, you can enjoy Vivid and fun video games on the big screen.

Simple operation - connect the game stick to the power supply, then plug in the TV, adjust the TV signal source to a high-definition channel, and the game list screen will be displayed on the TV. Specific steps: 1. First connect the HD output of the TV. 2. Insert the built-in TF game content card. 3. Use the charging adapter to connect to the power supply and it will automatically turn on (2 wireless controllers need to install 4 AAA batteries, not included in the package).

PERFECT GIFT - Handheld video games are lightweight and compact. Plug and play, does not take up much space, easy to carry, suitable for travel and home use. Not only bring fun play time for kids, but also wake up good childhood memories for post-80s and post-90s adults and release their life stress. Ideal gift for kids and adults on birthday or any occasion.
body.description: Product Description: The 32G version of this wireless retro game console has built-in 3500+ classic video games, and the 64G version has built-in 10200+ games, such as: sports, puzzle solving, fighting, racing and other games. A great choice as a perfect Holiday/Christmas/Thanksgiving/Halloween/Birthday gift for men, boys, fathers, kids, husbands and friends. Wireless retro game console parameter details: Model: RS-80 Expansion capacity: 32G / 64G memory card. Supported game formats: 9 emulators - 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, 128-bit, etc. Compatible with MAME, PS1, GB, GBA, GBC, MD, SFC, FC, ATARI2600 and ATARI7800 format games. CPU: GB2 Memory: DDR3 256MB Flash memory: 128MB Output format: HDMI high-definition output. USB power input: 5V 2A, 5V 1A or 5V 0.5A. Package list: 1 * game console 2 * game controllers（Not contain battery） 1 * memory card 1 * USB data cable 1 * HDMI cable 1 *packing box 1 * User Manual

reviews.reviewerName: There is only 15.000 games.. NOT 25.000… and a lot which dont work.. and a lot which name is not correct.. very dissappointed. Want my money back..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So this items has a lot of games and is fun but some freeze and some don’t even load and certain games are speed up with terrible graphics on others and you need batteries for the remote I would recommend but with a big heads up about certain things

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Certain controller buttons don't work on both controllers. Lots of glitches, while system stopped working randomly. Even for the cheap price, not worth it.
